original_text: But if the spot is unchanged and has not spread, it is only a scar from the boil, and the priest shall pronounce them clean.
korean_text: 그러나 그 색점이 여전하고 퍼지지 아니하였으면 이는 종기 흔적이니 제사장은 그를 정하다 할지니라

sentences.original_text: But if the spot is unchanged
it is only a scar from the boil
and the priest shall pronounce them clean
